==Adoption==
  +
[[Wikileaks]],<ref>http://wikileaks.org/support.html</ref><ref>http://twitter.com/#!/wikileaks/status/80774521350668288</ref><ref>http://blogs.forbes.com/andygreenberg/2011/06/14/wikileaks-asks-for-anonymous-bitcoin-donations/</ref> the [[Electronic Frontier Foundation]], [[Free Software Foundation]],<ref>http://www.fsf.org/blogs/community/bitcoins-a-new-way-to-donate-to-the-fsf</ref> [[Freenet]]<ref>https://freenetproject.org/donate.html</ref>, [[Pioneer One]]<ref>http://twitter.com/#!/pioneeronetv/status/36119594439544832</ref> and several others<ref>https://en.bitcoin.it/wiki/Donation-accepting_organizations_and_projects</ref> already accept donations in Bitcoin.
